Texts.Chs: 对于每一个额外的船员同伴，你需要一份新的船员契约。与^green;船员契约^reset;交互时，它将会显示他们的属性。
Texts.Eng: For each additional crewmate you'll need a new crew deed. Interacting with the ^green;Crew Deed^reset; when it has issues will show what they are.

Texts.Chs: ^green;船员契约^reset;允许你^orange;雇用船员同行s^reset;，但你需要把他们安置在一间封闭的房间中，这间房间至少有一扇^orange;门^reset;，一盏^orange;灯^reset;和一张^orange;床^reset;。在^orange;飞船设备制造台^reset;处建造一些，然后把它放在你的飞船上！
Texts.Eng: ^green;Crew Deeds^reset; allow you to ^orange;Hire Crewmates^reset; if you place them in an enclosed room that contains at least 1 ^orange;Door^reset;, 1 ^orange;Light^reset; and 1 ^orange;Bed^reset;. Build one at a ^orange;Ship Component Assembler^reset; and place it on your ship!
